title: 數學模型 (asymptotic function) 求高手

replies.msg:
假如我有一堆scaling factors (0 <= x <= 1) e.g. 0.2, 0.4, 0.6
Based on某criteria, 我想將堆scaling factors 乘埋整一個aggregate scaling factor, 但佢地會有唔同既加權(weighting) e.g. f(e) = (0.2*w1)(0.4*w2)(0.6*w3) (只係舉例, 個weighting唔一定係乘落去, 可以係exponent, 任你)

Criteria 如下:
1. 最細個scaling factor (0.2) 既weighting 會係1或冇weighting, 姐係冇變
2. 個scaling factor 愈大(相對於最細個scaling factor), 佢既weighted scaling factor個值會愈趨向1, 姐係0.2 < 0.4*w2 < 0.6*w3 < 1, 所以我標題提到asymptotic function

我想知一個咁既aggregate function應該點formulate同parameterize (假如我想scaling factor = 2*scaling factor (min) 時個weighted scaling factor會好接近1 vs. 我想scaling factor = 3*scaling factor (min)時個weighted scaling factor會好接近1, 條式會有咩分別)。

唔知係咪exactly你問既問題，但應該可以inspire到你
試下用boltzmann factor，P係[0,1] asymptotic to 1
將每個weighting變做exponent入面個sigma_n，對每個scaling factor_n set P_n(sigma_n)，就有n個equations，可以numerical咁得到每個sigma_n

replies.msg: 多謝巴打! 我e加都係朝exponent方向 "brute force" trial and error緊。你講既boltzmann factor我唔敢講話好明, 如果你有d參考link我會好感激 Anyway多謝多你一次

thx巴打, 姐係我有1 set x values (0 =< x =<1), 我係想整一系列weighting factors (除左set入面既x最少值冇weighting外), 令到大過x_min愈多倍既x(relative, not absolute difference matters) weighted之後個值會愈趨向1, 而唔係成個function(y)會因x愈大而趨向1

佢地的確有physical meaning, 成個目的 (同時consider幾個scaling factors)係想做到類似Liebig's Law of Minimum既效果, 但又唔exactly係, 因為唔想淨係比一個factor determine到個realized rate.

我仲係唔係好明個分別係邊
take任何我講既sequence {y_n}
define weighting factors w_i = y_i/x_i
then y_i = w_i*x_i
所以x_1 < w_2*x_2 < ...
同埋lim{w_n*x_n} = lim{y_n} = 1?
